other_tests.findings: The liver echotexture is normal, no intrahepatic bile duct dilation, a well-circumscribed hyperechoic right hepatic lesion measuring 2.6 x 2.4 x 2.4 cm, main portal vein patent, CBD measures 2 mm, gallbladder contains multiple mobile stones measuring up to 1.4 cm, no pericholecystic fluid, wall thickening, distention, or sonographic Murphy's sign, no free fluid.
